title: The Sea of Monsters - Percy Jackson and the Olympians
author: Rick Riordan
main_characters: Percy Jackson: The protagonist, a demigod son of Poseidon, who embarks on a journey to save his friend and Camp Half-Blood.
Annabeth Chase: Daughter of Athena, Percy's intelligent and resourceful friend who joins him on the quest.
Grover Underwood: A satyr and Percy's best friend, who is in danger and needs to be rescued.
Tyson: Percy's cyclops half-brother, who is kind-hearted and brave, though often underestimated.
Luke Castellan: A demigod son of Hermes and the main antagonist, who seeks to overthrow the Olympian gods.
Clarisse La Rue: Daughter of Ares, a tough and competitive camper who plays a key role in the story.
setting: The story takes place in various locations, including Camp Half-Blood, the magical sanctuary for demigods, the Sea of Monsters (the Bermuda Triangle), and several other mythical and real-world locations. The setting blends modern life with elements of Greek mythology, creating a fantastical yet relatable backdrop for the characters' journey.
